MeSH RDF Technical Documentation

Sample Queries


Which triples have 'Ofloxacin' as the object?

A basic subject, predicate, object triple in MeSH RDF.

PREFIX mesh: <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/>
PREFIX vocab: <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/vocab#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

SELECT *
FROM <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh2014>

WHERE {
?s ?p mesh:D015242 .
}

The Pharmacologic Actions of Oflaxacin and their labels.

Show the MeSH headings and labels of Pharmacologic Actions for Oflaxacin.

PREFIX mesh: <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/>
PREFIX vocab: <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/vocab#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

SELECT *
FROM <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh2014>

WHERE {
mesh:D015242 ?p ?pa .
?pa rdfs:label ?paLabel
}

Descriptors/SCRs that have the Pharmacologic Action 'Anti-Bacterial Agents'?

A filter query of MeSH predicates based on a certain type of Pharmacologic Action

PREFIX mesh: <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/>
PREFIX vocab: <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/vocab#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

SELECT ?d ?dLabel
FROM <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh2014>

WHERE {
?d meshv:pharmacologicalAction ?pa.
?d rdfs:label ?dLabel .
?pa rdfs:label "Anti-Bacterial Agents"
}

ORDER BY ASC (?dLabel)

Any MeSH descriptor that has an allowable qualifier of adverse effects.

MeSH has rules that govern which qualifiers can be used with which MeSH Headings.

PREFIX mesh: <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/>
PREFIX vocab: <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/vocab#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

SELECT distinct ?d ?dLabel
FROM <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh2014>

WHERE {
?d vocab:allowableQualifier ?q .
?q rdfs:label "adverse effects" .
?d rdfs:label ?dLabel
}

Any MeSH descriptor that is an ancestor of D005138 'Eyebrow',

The MeSH heading for 'Eybrow' can be retrieved through various paths in the MeSH tree. This query demonstrates how to 'explode up' the MeSH tree to find all ancestors.

PREFIX mesh: <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/>
PREFIX vocab: <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/vocab#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

SELECT ?treeNode ?ancestorTreeNode ?ancestor ?alabel
FROM <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh2014>

WHERE {
mesh:D005138 vocab:treeNumber ?treeNode .
?treeNode skos:broaderTransitive+ ?ancestorTreeNode .
?ancestor vocab:treeNumber ?ancestorTreeNode .
?ancestor rdfs:label ?alabel
}

ORDER BY ?treeNode ?ancestorTreeNode

Any MeSH descriptor that is a descendant of D009369 'Neoplasm'

Find all descendants (not just immediate children) of 'Neoplasm'. This query 'explodes down' the MeSH tree.

PREFIX mesh: <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/>
PREFIX vocab: <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/vocab#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

SELECT DISTINCT ?desc ?desc_label
FROM <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh2014>

WHERE {
mesh:D009369 vocab:treeNumber ?tn .
?desctn skos:broaderTransitive+ ?tn .
?desc vocab:treeNumber ?desctn .
?desc rdfs:label ?desc_label .
}

ORDER BY ?desc_label

Any MeSH term ('D' or 'M') that has 'infection' as part of its name.

Find MeSH descriptors or sub-concepts based on string.

PREFIX mesh: <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/>
PREFIX vocab: <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/vocab#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

SELECT *
FROM <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh2014>

WHERE {
?id rdfs:label ?label .
FILTER regex(?label, "infection","i")
FILTER regex(?id,"[MD]")
}

ORDER BY (?label)

What are all the new MeSH Descriptor in the 'Diseases' tree for a given year (2014).

This query leverages the MeSH 'C' tree to find new diseases in MeSH.

PREFIX mesh: <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/>
PREFIX vocab: <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/vocab#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema>

SELECT distinct ?id ?label
FROM <http://id.nlm.nih.gov/mesh2014>

WHERE {
?id vocab:dateEstablished ?dateEstablished .
?id rdfs:label ?label .
?id vocab:treeNumber ?tn
FILTER(?dateEstablished = xsd::date("2014-01-01"))
FILTER(REGEX(?tn,"C"))
}

ORDER BY ?label
